homepage.aboutText:
Welcome to Matthews NC Tree Trimmers, your local tree care specialists serving Matthews and surrounding communities since 1998. Based at 9303 Monroe Rd, we provide comprehensive tree services including professional removal, trimming, emergency storm response, and stump grinding.

Our ISA-certified arborists deliver expert tree care solutions across Matthews, Mint Hill, and Indian Trail. From routine maintenance to complex removals, we handle projects of all sizes with state-of-the-art equipment and proven techniques.

We offer competitive pricing starting at $275 for basic trimming services, $450+ for tree removal depending on size, and $95+ for stump grinding. All work is backed by our satisfaction guarantee and $2M liability insurance for your peace of mind.
whyChooseUs: 24/7 Emergency Response Team Available in Matthews & Surrounding Areas
ISA Certified Arborists with 25+ Years Local Experience
Free Same-Day Estimates & Competitive Local Pricing
Full Service Tree Care Company with Modern Equipment Fleet
5-Star Rated on Google with 200+ Verified Local Reviews
homepage.ctaText: Call (704) 249-3464 Now for a FREE Same-Day Estimate!

customerReviews.name: David Thompson
customerReviews.review: Incredible emergency response after the recent storm. Team arrived within an hour to remove a fallen oak from my roof. Professional, efficient, and fairly priced.

customerReviews.name: Sarah Martinez
customerReviews.review: Best tree service in Matthews! They trimmed several large maples and cleaned up perfectly. Very reasonable prices and professional crew.

customerReviews.name: Michael Wilson
customerReviews.review: Removed 3 stubborn stumps quickly and efficiently. Great cleanup job and competitive pricing. Will use again!

customerReviews.name: Jennifer Adams
customerReviews.review: Removed a massive dead pine near my house. The crew was extremely careful and professional. Highly recommend their services!

Stump grinding Matthews NC.title: Stump Grinding Matthews NC | Professional Tree Service Near Me 28270 - Stump Removal, Root Grinding, Land Clearing
Stump grinding Matthews NC.metaDescription: Expert stump grinding in Matthews NC by certified arborists. Same-day service available. Serving 28270 & surrounding areas. Free quotes. 20+ years local experience.
Stump grinding Matthews NC.h1: Professional Stump Grinding Services in Matthews, North Carolina
Stump grinding Matthews NC.description:
Matthews NC Tree Trimmers provides expert stump grinding services throughout Matthews and surrounding areas. With over 20 years of local experience, our certified team uses state-of-the-art equipment to safely and efficiently remove unsightly stumps from your property.

Local Stump Grinding Experts in Matthews

Our professional stump grinding service eliminates hazardous tree stumps that can attract pests, cause tripping hazards, and detract from your property's appearance. We use commercial-grade grinders that can handle stumps of any size, from small ornamental trees to large oak stumps.

Affordable Stump Removal Pricing

  • Small Stump (up to 12" diameter): $75-125
  • Medium Stump (13-24" diameter): $125-225
  • Large Stump (25"+ diameter): $225-400
  • Multiple stump discounts available
benefits: Prevents pest infestations and fungal growth
Creates usable space for landscaping or construction
Eliminates tripping hazards and improves property safety
Enhances property value and curb appeal
Prevents regrowth of unwanted trees
process: Initial assessment and free quote - We examine the stump size, location, and surrounding area
Site preparation - Clearing debris and ensuring safety measures are in place
Stump grinding - Using professional equipment to grind stump below ground level
Clean-up and restoration - Removing debris and filling hole with soil

faq.question: How deep do you grind tree stumps?
faq.answer: We typically grind stumps 6-8 inches below ground level, which is sufficient to plant grass or install landscaping over the area.

faq.question: How long does stump grinding take?
faq.answer: Most residential stump grinding jobs take 1-2 hours per stump, depending on size and location. We offer same-day service for Matthews residents.

faq.question: Do you remove the root system?
faq.answer: Our grinding service focuses on the visible stump and major surface roots. Deep roots will naturally decompose over time.

faq.question: What areas do you serve near Matthews?
faq.answer: We serve Matthews and surrounding areas including Mint Hill, Indian Trail, and Charlotte neighborhoods within the 28270 zip code.

why-tree-trimming-matthews-nc-is-essenti.title: Why Professional Tree Trimming in Matthews NC is Essential for Your Home's Safety and Value
why-tree-trimming-matthews-nc-is-essenti.metaDescription: Discover why regular tree trimming in Matthews NC is crucial for home safety, property value, and tree health. Expert services from Matthews NC Tree Trimmers.
why-tree-trimming-matthews-nc-is-essenti.content:
Maintaining the trees on your Matthews property isn't just about aesthetics it's a crucial investment in your home's safety, value, and overall curb appeal. As your local experts in tree trimming Matthews NC, we understand the unique challenges that homeowners in our community face when it comes to tree care.

The Importance of Regular Tree Trimming in Matthews

Matthews' climate and soil conditions create an ideal environment for rapid tree growth. However, without proper maintenance, this growth can lead to several issues:

  • Overgrown branches threatening power lines
  • Dead or diseased limbs risking property damage
  • Reduced sunlight reaching your lawn and garden
  • Decreased property value due to unkempt appearance

Benefits of Professional Tree Trimming Services

Enhanced Safety

Regular trimming helps prevent dangerous situations, especially during Matthews' storm seasons. Our storm damage tree removal team frequently responds to emergencies that could have been prevented with proper maintenance.

Improved Tree Health

Professional trimming removes:

  • Dead and dying branches
  • Diseased limbs
  • Crossing branches that create wounds
  • Growth that impedes air circulation

Increased Property Value

Well-maintained trees can increase your Matthews home's value by up to 20%. Our team serving Matthews and nearby Mint Hill communities knows exactly how to enhance your landscape's appearance.

When to Schedule Tree Trimming

While emergency services are available through our emergency tree service, regular maintenance is best performed during:

  • Late winter for deciduous trees
  • Early spring for flowering trees
  • Year-round for dead or hazardous branches

Professional Equipment and Expertise

Our certified arborists use specialized equipment and techniques, including tree cabling and bracing in Matthews when necessary, to ensure proper trimming without damaging your trees.

Preventive Care Saves Money

Regular trimming is more cost-effective than dealing with storm damage or emergency removal. It helps prevent:

  • Expensive emergency services
  • Property damage from falling branches
  • Disease spread among trees
  • Root system issues

Schedule Your Tree Trimming Service Today

Don't wait until your trees become a hazard. Contact Matthews NC Tree Trimmers at (704) 249-3464 for a free consultation. Our experienced team provides professional tree trimming services throughout Matthews and surrounding areas, ensuring your trees remain healthy, safe, and beautiful all year round.

how-to-safely-remove-trees-in-matthews-d.title: How to Safely Remove Trees in Matthews: DIY vs Professional Tree Removal Guide
how-to-safely-remove-trees-in-matthews-d.metaDescription: Learn the pros and cons of DIY vs professional tree removal in Matthews, NC. Expert safety tips and guidance from Matthews NC Tree Trimmers. Call (704) 249-3464.
how-to-safely-remove-trees-in-matthews-d.content:
When it comes to removing trees in Matthews, NC, homeowners often face the crucial decision between DIY tree removal and hiring professional tree services. While the DIY approach might seem cost-effective, understanding the risks and requirements is essential for making an informed choice.

Understanding Tree Removal Safety in Matthews

Matthews' unique landscape and varying tree species require specific knowledge and expertise for safe removal. Whether you're dealing with storm damage or planning preventive maintenance, safety should always be your top priority.

Common Risks of DIY Tree Removal

  • Potential property damage from falling limbs
  • Personal injury risks from improper equipment use
  • Electrical hazards from nearby power lines
  • Structural damage to surrounding buildings
  • Legal liability issues

When to Consider Professional Tree Removal

Our tree removal experts in Matthews NC recommend professional services when:

  • Trees are near power lines or structures
  • The tree is diseased or damaged
  • Complex root systems are involved
  • Emergency removal is needed due to storm damage

DIY Tree Removal: Essential Safety Steps

If you're considering DIY removal for smaller trees, follow these crucial safety measures:

  • Assess the tree's lean and surrounding obstacles
  • Use proper safety equipment (helmet, goggles, gloves)
  • Have a clear escape route
  • Never work alone
  • Check local permits and regulations

Professional Tree Removal Benefits

Professional services like Matthews NC Tree Trimmers offer:

  • Comprehensive insurance coverage
  • Professional-grade equipment
  • Experienced crew members
  • Proper disposal services
  • Emergency response capabilities

Additional Tree Care Services

Beyond removal, we offer comprehensive tree care including tree cabling and bracing and professional tree trimming. For more information about managing storm-damaged trees, read our guide on Storm Damage Tree Removal in Matthews.

Cost Considerations: DIY vs Professional

While DIY might seem cheaper initially, consider these factors:

  • Equipment rental costs
  • Disposal fees
  • Potential property damage risks
  • Insurance requirements
  • Time investment

Making the Right Choice for Your Property

Whether you're in SouthPark or Monroe, choosing the right approach to tree removal is crucial. For complex or large tree removal projects, professional services provide peace of mind and guaranteed results.

Need expert tree removal services in Matthews? Contact Matthews NC Tree Trimmers at (704) 249-3464 for a free assessment and professional consultation. Our certified arborists are ready to help you safely remove any tree while protecting your property.

emergency-tree-service-in-matthews-nc-qu.metaDescription: Need emergency tree service in Matthews NC? Learn essential quick response tips for tree emergencies. Available 24/7 for urgent tree removal and storm damage. Call (704) 249-3464.
emergency-tree-service-in-matthews-nc-qu.content:
When severe weather strikes Matthews, NC, knowing how to respond to tree emergencies can protect your property and loved ones. At Matthews NC Tree Trimmers, we provide 24/7 emergency tree service to residents throughout Matthews and surrounding areas. Here's your comprehensive guide to handling tree emergencies effectively.

Identifying Tree Emergencies in Matthews

Not every fallen branch constitutes an emergency, but certain situations require immediate professional attention:

  • Trees leaning against structures
  • Split or cracked major limbs
  • Trees blocking driveways or roads
  • Trees touching power lines
  • Storm-damaged trees threatening to fall

Immediate Steps During a Tree Emergency

When faced with a tree emergency in Matthews:

  1. Ensure everyone's safety by clearing the area
  2. Document damage with photos for insurance
  3. Contact emergency services if power lines are involved
  4. Call our emergency response team at (704) 249-3464

Our Emergency Response Protocol

Our emergency tree service team follows a strict protocol to handle urgent situations efficiently. Whether you're in Matthews or nearby Mint Hill, we arrive equipped with specialized gear for immediate action.

Preventive Measures to Avoid Tree Emergencies

Regular maintenance can significantly reduce the risk of tree emergencies. Our tree trimming services in Matthews NC help maintain healthy trees year-round. We recommend:

  • Annual professional inspections
  • Regular pruning and maintenance
  • Tree cabling and bracing for vulnerable trees
  • Pre-storm assessments

Storm Damage Response

Matthews residents often face tree emergencies during severe weather. Our storm damage tree removal experts are trained to handle complex situations safely. Learn more about storm preparation in our guide on Storm Damage Tree Removal in Matthews.

When to Schedule Emergency Tree Removal

Sometimes, emergency tree removal is the only safe option. Signs you need immediate service include:

  • Severe lean developing suddenly
  • Visible root lifting
  • Major trunk splits
  • Multiple large dead branches

Professional Emergency Response Team

Our certified arborists serve Matthews and surrounding communities including SouthPark with 24/7 emergency response. We're equipped to handle any tree emergency, large or small.

Contact Us for Emergency Tree Service

Don't wait until it's too late. If you're experiencing a tree emergency in Matthews or nearby areas, call us immediately at (704) 249-3464. Our emergency response team is available 24/7, ready to protect your property with professional tree care services.

Remember, attempting DIY tree work during emergencies can be extremely dangerous. Learn more about professional versus DIY approaches in our article on safely removing trees in Matthews.

Signs You Need Emergency Tree Removal
